instructions: Consider the following two-stage game. In the first stage, there is a 75% chance to end the game without winning anything, and a 25% chance to move into the second stage. If you reach the second stage you have a choice between: Your choice must be made before the game starts, i.e., before the outcome of the first stage is known. Please indicate the option you prefer.

items.question: Which of the options do you prefer?
